name: Skallen
description:
Guide this lost but tenacious skull in the hunt for her lost body. Tap the left side of the screen to go left. Tap the right side of the screen to go right. Tap both sides to jump!
All levels are unique and will not be repeated through procedural generation. There are 20 levels to try out for free. If you like what you see there are more levels to be purchased. No ads.
